title: arasE un aDimaiyai
sahitya:
arasE un aDimaiyaik-karai sErat-tuNai shei shei akhilANDa kOTi Alum


anupallavi

  murasinri uraiyinri muttozhilum puriginra mudalvA nin pudalvan shei murai kETTu niraivETri


caraNam    kaNNIrAl en pizhaigaL karppakOTi kAlam kazhuvin un kazhal paTrinEn 
eNNuvadum paNNuvadum uNNuvadum unnAlE ennappa en iraiva unnai sharaN pughundEn
